# Range queries on block compression 
```{r}
library(tidyverse)
rm(list=ls())

rel_diff <- function(a, b) a / b
fname <- "./block_compression/ms_data/sizes.csv"

aa <- (
  read_csv(fname, col_names=c("exp_type", "size"))
  %>% separate(exp_type, c("block_type", "bt", "start", "end_"), sep = "_")
  %>% separate(end_, c("end", "compr"), extra="merge")
  %>% mutate(start=as.numeric(start), end=as.numeric(end))
)
aa


ggplot(aa, aes(start, size, color=compr)) + geom_line()

```

# Range queries on vanilla compression 
```{r}
library(tidyverse)
rm(list=ls())

rel_diff <- function(a, b) a / b
base_dir <- "./vanilla_compression_techniques"

read_time_dataset <- function(a, input_id){
  time_dd <- (
    read_csv(sprintf("%s/%s/%s.t.ms.csv", base_dir, a, input_id))
    %>% filter(method %in% c('algorithm'))
    %>% mutate(time_ms = time_ms / nqueries, 
               method=case_when(block_size == 0 ~ 'trivial', TRUE ~ 'rle')) 
    %>% select(-nqueries, -compression, -block_size)
  )
  time_dd
}

read_t <- function(a){
  rbind(read_time_dataset(a, 'mm') %>% mutate(dset='mouse_human'),
        read_time_dataset(a, 'HG03061-2') %>% mutate(dset='human_human')) %>% mutate(algo=a)
}

read_sizes_dataset <- function(input_id){
  get_size <- function(e){
    file.info(sprintf('%s/%s.t.ms.%s', base_dir, input_id, e))$size
  }
  space_dd <- (
    tibble(compression = c('delta', 'nibble', 'none', 'rle', 'rrr', 'succint'))
    %>% mutate(size = sapply(compression, get_size))
  )
  
  space_dd <- rbind(space_dd,
                    space_dd
                    %>% filter(compression == 'none')
                    %>% mutate(compression = 'word'))

  space_dd <- (
    space_dd %>% mutate(gr = 1)
    %>% inner_join(
      space_dd %>% filter(compression == "none") %>% transmute(gr = 1, nsize=size),
      by=c("gr"))
    %>% mutate(size_diff = rel_diff(size, nsize))
    %>% select(-gr)
  )
  space_dd  
}

space_dd <- rbind(read_sizes_dataset('HG03061-2') %>% mutate(dset='human_human'),
                  read_sizes_dataset('mm') %>% mutate(dset='chimp_human'))

time_dd <- (rbind(read_csv('./vanilla_compression_techniques/HG03061-2.t.ms.csv')
                  %>% mutate(dset = 'human_human'),
                  read_csv('./vanilla_compression_techniques/mm.t.ms.csv')
                  %>% mutate(dset = 'mouse_chimp'))
            %>% filter(method == 'algorithm')
            %>% mutate(block_size = case_when(block_size == 0 ~ 'trivial',
                                              block_size == -1 ~ 'djamal',
                                              TRUE ~ as.character(block_size)),
                       time_pq_ms = time_ms / nqueries)
            %>% select(-range_size, -method)
            %>% select(dset, compression, block_size, time_pq_ms)
)
time_dd
ggplot(time_dd %>% filter(block_size != 'trivial'), aes(factor(compression), time_pq_ms, fill=block_size)) +
  geom_bar(stat='identity', position='dodge') + 
  facet_wrap(~dset, scales = 'free_y')

ggplot(time_dd %>% filter(compression == 'word', block_size == 0) %>% select(-block_size),
       aes(range_size, time_ms, fill=dset)) +
  geom_bar(stat='identity', position='dodge')

ggplot(time_dd
       %>% left_join(space_dd, by=c("compression", "dset")),# %>% filter(),
       aes(100 * size_diff, time_diff,
           color=compression,
           shape=(compression == 'none'))) +
  geom_point() +
  labs(x = "% space over 'none'",
       y = "Time change factor (over 'none')") +
  scale_y_log10() + facet_grid(dset~block_size)
```


# Junk
```{r}
library(tidyverse)
ddf <- tribble(
  ~method, ~time_ms, 
  'numpy_1hot', 1.9, 
  'cuda_1hot', 0.25,
  'cuda_dense', 0.89
) %>% mutate(speedup = 122 / time_ms)
ddf

ggplot(ddf, aes(method, speedup)) + geom_bar(stat='identity', position = 'dodge') + labs(y = 'Speedup', subtitle = "Speedup over 'numpy_dense'")
  ```
